      • ethPrio

        public final byte ethPrio()
        Queries the priority field in the Ethernet's optional 802.1Q tag. The 802.1Q tag is generally used to identify which VLAN it belongs to and its priority for QoS.
        Returns:
        the value stored in the priority field.

      • ethVlan

        public final short ethVlan()
        Queries the VLAN field in the optional 802.1Q tag of the Ethernet packet. The 802.1Q tag is generally used to identify which VLAN it belongs to and its priority for QoS.
        Returns:
        the value stored in the VLAN field.
